decisionsMade.decision: Switched user from Sonnet to Haiku model
decisionsMade.rationale: 90% cost reduction on conversation, sufficient capability for daily tasks

decisionsMade.decision: Finance dashboard: manual entry only (Plaid SDK unreliable)
decisionsMade.rationale: Fastest working path; live bank feeds can wait until proven daily usage

decisionsMade.decision: Nutrition React dashboard deployment to port 3000
decisionsMade.rationale: Reversible; visual-first design ready for food photo macro integration

decisionsMade.decision: Auto-log food photos to nutrition dashboard
decisionsMade.rationale: Friction reduction; dashboard is editable if extraction is imperfect

decisionsMade.decision: Recommended Kenneth Walker Under 77.5 as primary Super Bowl bet
decisionsMade.rationale: Highest edge; Patriots defense clamps run game, Seattle script favors pass
